name: mackenza.html-smarthints
title: PHP SmartHints
description: Provides code hints for HTML files including HTML keywords, built-in functions, constants and variables.  Also provides hinting for variables in the current open PHP document. Note that this is a continuation of the former [PHP-SIG] Brackets-PHP-SmartHints and not a new extension or fork.  The Brackets Registry flags it as a new extension if you change the name (makes sense).
author: Andrew MacKenzie <a.mackenzie@gmail.com> (https://github.com/mackenza)
